org.linqs.psl.application.topicmodel.reasoner.admm

Class LatentTopicNetworkADMMReasoner

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.linqs.psl.reasoner.admm.ADMMReasoner
      • org.linqs.psl.application.topicmodel.reasoner.admm.LatentTopicNetworkADMMReasoner
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GroundRuleStore, Reasoner

    public class LatentTopicNetworkADMMReasoner
extends ADMMReasoner
    Wrapper around the ADMM reasoner which adds a little functionality needed for latent topic networks.
    Author:
    Jimmy Foulds

    • Field Detail

      • LOWER_BOUND_EPSILON_KEY

        public static final String LOWER_BOUND_EPSILON_KEY
        Key for positive double property. Minimum value that theta and phi parameters are allowed to take, enforced by clipping the consensus variables to this.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values
